conversations.body_text: Hi chris storey,    I apologize for not responding promptly; we just wrapped up our weekend break. I've upgraded your order to expedited shipping. You can click this link to pay the difference.    https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference

Hey Morning,

Oh no problem at all!

just paid the difference:

Best,

Chris
